title: File a Document Under Seal
description: An attorney needs to file a document that contains highly confidential trade secrets, requiring it to be filed under seal.

tasks.description: Draft a motion to file under seal, explaining to the court why the information is confidential and requires protection.
Create a redacted, public version of the document with the confidential information blacked out.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the public version of the file.

tasks.description: Electronically file the motion to seal, the redacted public version, and submit the unredacted version to the court through the proper sealed filing procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly follows the complex e-filing procedure for sealed documents.
